Package org.osate.xtext.aadl2.agcl.analysis.visitors

This package contains visitors (Ecore switches) for processing the AADL models and the AGCL clauses.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AgclProcessingSwitch<T>
    An AGCL-specific visitor (processing switch), very similar to AadlProcessingSwitch but works on AGCL's constructs.
    CommonAGCLAnalysisSwitch
    Base class for AGCL Analysis visitors
    PSLASTPrinter
    This class is intended to return a serialized version of the AST of a PSL formula.
    PSLDeepCopyerExplicitSwitch
    A class to perform explicit copy of PSL terms, because there doesn't seem to be a simple way in Ecore.
    PSLHomomorphismExplicitSwitch
    This class implements the core of any homomorphic map over PSL expressions.
    PSLSerializerExplicit
    An explicit serializer for PSL formulas.
    ViewpointContext
    A ViewpointContext encapsulates the collection of viewpoints declared and the (declared) viewpoints to verify in a given analysis run.
    ViewpointContextSwitch
    This class initializes the viewpoint context used by the different analysis switches by collecting declared viewpoints and viewpoints to verify.

Package org.osate.xtext.aadl2.agcl.analysis.visitors Description

This package contains visitors (Ecore switches) for processing the AADL models and the AGCL clauses.

It provides the link between actions in the org.osate.xtext.aadl2.agcl.analysis.actions package and the corresponding algorithms in the org.osate.xtext.aadl2.agcl.analysis.actions.

When an action is invoked, the visitors in this package, traverse the AADL model, visiting the relevant AGCL clauses from which the visitor extracts the relevant model and clause information, and invokes the corresponding analysis algorithm.

This core functionality is defined in a common base class CommonAGCLAnalysisSwitch which finds general AnnexLibrary and AnnexSubclause nodes and delegates processing to the concrete visitors to process AGCLAnnexLibrary and AGCLAnnexSubclause nodes.

It also provides other useful visitors for processing AGCL clauses and PSL specifications.

Author:
Ernesto Posse
